alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Hermosa Foot Hills; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 3:52PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Custer and northeastern Fall River Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 352 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southern Custer State Park, or 8 miles southeast of Custer, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Buffalo Gap, Fairburn, Wind Cave National Park, Blue Bell, Center Lake, Custer State Park, Mount Coolidge, Legion Lake, Buffalo Corrals, State Game Lodge and Black Hills Playhouse. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Custer Co Plains; Hermosa Foot Hills; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills
